inclusion.criterion: Presence of Portal Hypertension with or without cirrhosis.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Failure to control variceal bleeding by emergency endoscopic therapy.
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has HCV Cirrhosis, grade II esophageal varices, and recent admission for UGIB. He is being treated with lactulose for hepatic encephalopathy.
